Detailed Description

Encapsulates an atom in a molecule

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gigide::Atom::Atom ( VectorPtr  xyz,
std::string  atomic_symbol 
)

Constructor

Parameters:
xyz A std::vector given the xyz coordinates
atomic_symbol A symbol specifying the atom. For now, only the standard H,He,C,etc. symbols are allowed In future versions, non-standard D,C13,isotope symbols will be allowed.

void Atom::scaleXYZ ( double  scfactor  ) 

Scales the xyz coordinates by a certain value

Parameters:
scfactor The scale factor for the scaling operation

void Atom::setXYZ ( VectorPtr  newxyz  ) 

Sets new xyz coordinates. The assignment works by replacing the values in the original std::vector. In other words, the the VectorPtr pointer does not change. The values are reassigned, not the pointer.

Parameters:
newxyz The coordinates to assign

string Atom::symbol (  ) 

Prints descriptive info about the atom Gets the atomic symbol

Returns:
The atomic symbol as a std::string
